m_szDocSumamry: Chevy Bolt In Action (Video) Originally published on EV Obsession . Sure, the Tesla Model X is great and everything, but how many of us can actually afford one of them? On that note, a new video of a Chevy Bolt mule in action has come to my attention. (The video is not super new, but this is the first I’ve seen it.) While much still remains unknown about the production version of the Chevrolet Bolt, one thing that we do know is that it is supposed to be fairly “affordable” — and will perhaps be cheap enough to see particularly strong sales (meaning stronger than the Nissan Leaf or Chevy Volt p
